tweet_text_element: To all the former Xbots, you should check out Astro's Playroom! It's a fun little platformer that takes you through the history of PlayStation! You also get to play with a robot, which is similar to you being an Xbot, so it will feel familiar and welcoming!

Why is PlayStation's operating profit so low?

Here's a closer look at profit trends for Sony's games division. 

A quick glance reveals some culprits:

‚Ä¢ Increasing game development costs
‚Ä¢ Historically unfavorable exchange rates
‚Ä¢ Acquisition costs
‚Ä¢ Lower PS5 profitability
